name: Passivhaus masterclass – getting it right
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description: A session that covers the right approaches to different aspects of Passivhaus including getting mechanical ventilation with heat recovery right, how Passivhaus can be used to help with Part L compliance and working with the Passivhaus planning package.

presentations.name: Masterclass on how passivhaus helps you meet Part L
presentations.speakers: Representative from the Passivhaus Trust, Speaker tbc

presentations.name: Masterclass on ventilation and heat recovery
